NATIONAL_ID_LENGTH_VALIDATION.message: A National ID has to be of length 14.

NATIONAL_ID_IS_NUMBER_VALIDATION.message: A National ID has to consist of only numbers.

NATIONAL_ID_NOT_A_STRING.message: A National ID has to be a string.

NATIONAL_ID_BIRTHDATE_CANNOT_BE_IN_THE_F.message: A National ID cannot have a birthdate that is in the future.

NATIONAL_ID_HAS_TO_HAVE_A_VALID_MONTH.message: A National ID cannot have a birthday with a month above 12 or below 1.

NATIONAL_ID_HAS_TO_HAVE_A_VALID_DAY.message: A National ID cannot have a birthday with a day above 31 or below 1.

NATIONAL_ID_HAS_TO_HAVE_A_VALID_GOVERNAT.message: A National ID cannot have an invalid birth governate code.

NATIONAL_ID_HAS_TO_HAVE_A_VALID_GENDER.message: A National ID cannot have an invalid gender code.

NATIONAL_ID_HAS_TO_HAVE_A_VALID_MINISTRY.message: A National ID cannot have an invalid ministry of interior code.
